name: Eight Legged Eating Machine
description:
You have obtained custody over a little eight legged friend.
Please give it a name, and help it get food for the winter.

Controls: (Mouse only!)
Mouse the mouse cursor to aim in the direction you want to shoot.
Left Mouse Button: Shoot web-string
Right Mouse Button: Shoot web-ball

Web String:
Press and hold to drag prey back into your web

Web Ball:
Turn prey into a juicy snack once they are on your web
or use it to repel pesky wasps.

Flies:
Become food once they have been turned into a webbed snack for a while.
If you eat them raw, they deal damage to your delicate body.

Wasps:
Like yummy flies, and if you eat their food, they might come for you.

Health:
Its precious, you only have finite amounts of it.
